casebody.data:
In the Matter of Edward MENDLOWITZ, Bankrupt. Hyman Gold, Appellant. No. 61. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 11, 1934. Poses, Kateher & Driesen, of New York City (Stanley A. Kateher, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Louis I. Rothenberg, of Brooklyn,- N. Y. (Samuel J. Sussman, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
